name: Cyber OutRun
description:
Cyber OutRun is an arcade pursuit game, inspired 80's aesthetic of neon lights and soundtracks.

The game offers you three game modes in a beautiful retro-futuristic visual atmosphere with Synthwave soundtrack.

Break law with your exotic car. Just turn on your radio and put the pedal to the metal, laws can't stop you!





Cyber OutRun offers you three single player game modes



Reach highest heat level and avoid getting arrested.



Play against the clock and beat the time.



Drive free as the wind.
